info.brief_description: Sarah Michelle Gellar has more problems to contend with than just zombies...
info.description:
As I'm sure all of you know, the new Call of Duty: Black Ops map pack just came out, and on the top of (almost) everyone's list is the new zombie map: Call of the Dead. One of the new characters is Sarah Michelle Gellar of Buffy the Vampire Slayer fame. So, why not make an interactive for it?
What's Allowed:
Expansion/Inflation (breast, butt, body, etc.)
Vore (pred only, please)
Gas (burping, belching, etc.)
TF (inanimate, animal, etc.)
Zombie killing

What's NOT Allowed:
Gay stuff (there's other stories for that)
Giantess
Feet stuff

You can have her alone, or with the other characters as well. George Romero can interact with her as well. And guys, it's a zombie story. Make sure you include them too. You can end it, but try to make a second option as well. And please try not to kill her. Alright, let's get to it!
